min_ram.description: Amount of ram (in MB) required to boot image.

ramdisk_id.description: ID of image stored in Glance that should be used as the ramdisk when booting an AMI-style image.

locations.description: A set of URLs to access the image file kept in external store

size.description: Size of image file in bytes

os_distro.description: Common name of operating system distribution as specified in http://docs.openstack.org/trunk/openstack-compute/admin/content/adding-images.html

os_version.description: Operating system version as specified by the distributor

direct_url.description: URL to access the image file kept in external store

tags.description: List of strings related to the image

kernel_id.description: ID of image stored in Glance that should be used as the kernel when booting an AMI-style image.

updated_at.description: Date and time of the last image modification

min_disk.description: Amount of disk space (in GB) required to boot image.

virtual_size.description: Virtual size of image in bytes

instance_uuid.description: ID of instance used to create this image.

created_at.description: Date and time of image registration

protected.description: If true, image will not be deletable.

architecture.description: Operating system architecture as specified in http://docs.openstack.org/trunk/openstack-compute/admin/content/adding-images.html
